page.title: 16Pre-school groups in Wenlock
page.content: {The Playgroup}has{58 children}at present. Children attend once, twice or three times a week.{The Playgroup meets{three times a week}at the{Youth {Club building.} The sessions last for two{hours-10:00a.m. to 12 noon}and {1:30p.m. to 3:30p.m.}The children learn many things, generally through play, including social skills, basic discipline, how to hold a pencil and paintbrush and to sit still and listen. {Much Wenlock Mother's and Toddlers {Club}is for Mother's to meet and talk, and for mothers, new to Much Wenlock, to make friends. The size of membership is{25,}and about 15 people meet every Tuesday, in school-term time, at{The Priory Hall,}between {10:30a.m. and 12 noon.
